entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
